price: 16. Bagi mereka segala yang mereka kehendaki ada di dalamnya (surga), mereka kekal (di dalamnya). Itulah janji Tuhanmu yang pantas dimohonkan (kepada-Nya).
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā mā yashāūna khālidīna kāna ʿalā rabbika waʿdan masūlan
